_header: Among holy gospels all it is not good to believe
Note: For variant versions in short lines see 874 and 2479.
Title(s): South English Legendary ; Euangelium In principio
_description: ‘Euangelium In principio’, in the South English Legendary — in couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
In þe by gynnyng of þe fadir þe sone was &
                    is& þe sone was a nente god & god was sone I
                    wis…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…now seynt Jhon þe euangelist þat gode mon art &
                    hendepraye to hym þat vs made þe Ioye of heuene vs
                    sende

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
Among oþer gospels hit ys noȝt to byleueÞo holy
                    gospel of Seint Iohan of godes grace hit ne
                    ȝeue[fore-edge]…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…A wys Ion þe euangelist þat god man ert &
                    hendeBide þat god to þulke ioie þat þow ert inne vs
                    sende
OxfCCC431.Note: Portion of text lost due to mutilation of leaves.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Among holy gospelles alle hit is nouȝt goed to by leueÞe
                    holy gospel of Seint Ion ȝif god vs grace ȝeue…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now with Ion þe Ewangelist þat goed man art and
                    hendeÞou ffor vs bydde þat to þulke ioye þat þou
                    art ynne Ihesu criste vs sende
